original_text: Then I heard a loud sound which came from heaven. The noise was like water that pours along a river very fast. It was like the loud noise of thunder. The sound was like people who were making music with harps.
korean_text: 내가 하늘에서 나는 소리를 들으니 많은 물 소리와도 같고 큰 우렛소리와도 같은데 내가 들은 소리는 거문고 타는 자들이 그 거문고를 타는 것 같더라

sentences.original_text: Then I heard a loud sound
that pours along a river very fast
sentences.korean_translation: 강을 따라 매우 빠르게 흐르는 물과 같았습니다

sentences.original_text: It was like the loud noise of thunder
who were making music with harps
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 하프로 음악을 연주하는 것과 같았습니다
